item.title: Some Kaldi Things
item.description: This is a regularly updated post on some tips and tricks for working with Kaldi. List of contents: How to stop training mid-way and decode using last trained stage About Sum() and Append() in Kaldi xconfig Checking training logs Converting between FV and FM types Number of epochs in Kaldi How to stop training mid-way and decode using last trained stage In the Kaldi chain model, suppose you are training for 4 epochs (which is close to 1000 iterations in the usual run of the TED-LIUM recipe).
